short_summary: Amendment to Tender: Supply and Delivery of one (1) Multi-Spectral Image
description: (MANDATORY SPECS) ANNEX A: SUPPLY AND DELIVERY OF ONE (1) MULT-SPECTRAL IMAGER FOR REQUIREMENT_at Swift Current; Delivery before MAR 31, 2023;
duration_in_months: If the contract is awarded by November 1, the estimated contract duration is 6 weeks from 31 March 2023 to 14 May 2023, with consideration for the conclusion of the stated evaluation and acceptance process. The estimated contract duration is 4 months if the contract was awarded after November 1.
